description: This CSS file contains style rules for a Coffee App frontend, defining variables for light and dark themes, styles for various components like the application header, links, and a theme toggle button.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application styling including background, text alignment, and animations.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header component of the application, including layout and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styling for links used in the application, with hover transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling between light and dark themes, with hover and active state effects.
